messageValues.message:
=Instruction: Generate two paragraph, detailed social media caption.

Content Requirements:

Length & Detail: The caption must be long and detailed, providing substantial information about the specific topic.

Research: Search online for factual details about the topic to ensure accuracy and richness of information.

Include exactly two relevant emojis naturally within the caption.t.

Call to Action (CTA): Include a relevant and engaging call to action within the text (e.g., "Tell us what you think in the comments!").

Hashtags: Include a maximum of seven (7) relevant hashtags. These hashtags must be naturally merged into the end of the paragraph, forming a smooth, single flow of text.

Formatting:

The entire output must together.
Put a phragraph gap between caption and hastag.

Each hashtag must start with # and be separated by a space, not commas.

return $input.all().map(i => ({ json: { fileName: i.json.fileName } }));
